languages.text: Вокс-оператор уловил сигнал, пришедший с планеты. Сообщение гласит: "С верой в Императора-Пращура нашего вещаем всем, кто слышит. Говорит обитель истинно верующих пилигримов Йесевон, колониальный артикул АIII-649-Минорис. По завету Императора-Пращура нашего мы, церковь Кормителей, приглашаем под наш кров всякого, кто нуждается в помощи или терпит бедствие, без оглядки на то, богобоязненные вы люди или грешные. В Йесевоне помогут каждому".

The vox operator has intercepted a transmission coming from the planet. The message runs, "With faith in our Emperor-Progenitor, we are broadcasting this to any who may hear. This is Jesevon, an abode of true-believing pilgrims, colonial designation AIII-649-Minoris. As commanded by our Emperor-Progenitor, we, the Church Nourishing, invite any who need help or are in distress to take shelter with us. It matters not whether you are pious people or apostates. Here in Jesevon, we help everyone."
languages.original_text: Вокс-оператор уловил сигнал, пришедший с планеты. Сообщение гласит: "С верой в Императора-Пращура нашего вещаем всем, кто слышит. В Йесевоне помогут каждому".

Here in Jesevon, we help everyone."

Here in Jesevon, we help everyone."

languages.text: El operador de vocos ha interceptado una transmisión del planeta. El mensaje dice lo siguiente: «Guiados por la fe en el Emperador-Progenitor, enviamos este mensaje a quien pueda oírnos. Hablamos desde Jesevon, una morada de peregrinos fieles, con designación colonial AIII 649-Minoris. Como ordena el Emperador-Progenitor, la Iglesia de los Nutridores invita a cualquiera que necesite ayuda o que tenga algún problema a refugiarse con nosotros. No importa si son gente piadosa o un puñado de apóstatas, en Jesevon ayudamos a todos».
languages.original_text: The vox operator has intercepted a transmission coming from the planet. The message runs, "With faith in our Emperor-Progenitor, we are broadcasting this to any who may hear. This is Jesevon, an abode of true-believing pilgrims, colonial designation AIII-649-Minoris. As commanded by our Emperor-Progenitor, we, the Church Nourishing, invite any who need help or are in distress to take shelter with us. It matters not whether you are pious people or apostates. Here in Jesevon, we help everyone."

traits.locale_text: El operador de vocos ha interceptado una transmisión del planeta. El mensaje dice lo siguiente: «Guiados por la fe en el Emperador-Progenitor, enviamos este mensaje a quien pueda oírnos. Hablamos desde Jesevon, una morada de peregrinos fieles, con designación colonial AIII 649-Minoris. Como ordena el Emperador-Progenitor, la Iglesia de los Nutridores invita a cualquiera que necesite ayuda o que tenga algún problema a refugiarse con nosotros. No importa si son gente temerosa de Dios o pecadores, en Jesevon ayudamos a todos».

languages.text: 音阵操作员截获了来自该行星的传输信号，内容如下：“怀着对元祖神皇的信仰，我们向所有能听到这条广播的人传达信息。这里是杰西文，忠贞的朝圣者们的居所，殖民地名称为：AIII-649号小型殖民地。根据元祖神皇的命令，我们滋养教会邀请所有需要帮助或处于困境中的民众与我们一起避难。无论你们是虔诚之人还是异端分子，这都不重要。在杰西文，我们会一视同仁，对所有人伸出援手。”
languages.original_text: The vox operator has intercepted a transmission coming from the planet. The message runs, "With faith in our Emperor-Progenitor, we are broadcasting this to any who may hear. This is Jesevon, an abode of true-believing pilgrims, colonial designation AIII-649-Minoris. As commanded by our Emperor-Progenitor, we, the Church Nourishing, invite any who need help or are in distress to take shelter with us. It matters not whether you are pious people or apostates. Here in Jesevon, we help everyone."

traits.locale_text: 音阵操作员截获了来自该行星的传输信号，内容如下：“怀着对元祖神皇的信仰，我们向所有能听到这条广播的人传达信息。这里是杰西文，忠贞的朝圣者们的居所，殖民地名称为：AIII 649号小型殖民地。根据元祖神皇的命令，我们滋养教会邀请所有需要帮助或处于困境中的民众与我们一起避难。无论你们是敬畏神皇之人还是罪人，这都不重要。在杰西文，我们会一视同仁，对所有人伸出援手。”

languages.text: ヴォクス・オペレーターは、惑星から発信される送信内容を横から受信した。メッセージの内容はこうだ。「皇帝の始祖に忠誠を誓って、聞いているであろう民に発信している。こちらはジェセボン、真の信仰心がある巡礼者の住処、指定コロニー AIII-649-ミノリス。皇帝の始祖の命に従い、我々チャーチナージングは、助けが必要な者や苦しんでいる者を迎え入れている。あなた方が敬虔な人々であるか、背教者であるかは関係ない。ここジェセボンは、誰にでも手を差し伸べる場所だ」
languages.original_text: The vox operator has intercepted a transmission coming from the planet. The message runs, "With faith in our Emperor-Progenitor, we are broadcasting this to any who may hear. This is Jesevon, an abode of true-believing pilgrims, colonial designation AIII-649-Minoris. As commanded by our Emperor-Progenitor, we, the Church Nourishing, invite any who need help or are in distress to take shelter with us. It matters not whether you are pious people or apostates. Here in Jesevon, we help everyone."

traits.locale_text: ヴォクス・オペレーターは、惑星から発信される送信内容を横から受信した。メッセージの内容はこうだ。「皇帝の始祖に忠誠を誓って、聞いているであろう民に発信している。こちらはジェセボン、真の信仰心がある巡礼者の住処、指定コロニー AIII-649-ミノリス。皇帝の始祖の命に従い、我々チャーチナージングは、助けが必要な者や苦しんでいる者を迎え入れている。あなた方が敬虔な人々であるか、背教者であるかは関係ない。ここジェセボンは、誰にでも手を差し伸べる場所だ」

languages.text: Der Vox-Operateur hat eine Übertragung abgefangen, die von dem Planeten kam. Die Nachricht lautet: "Voller Vertrauen zu unserem Imperator-Progenitor senden wir dies an alle, die es hören. Hier spricht Jesevon, eine Heimstatt wahrhaft gläubiger Pilger, Koloniebezeichnung AIII-649-Minoris. Wie von unserem Imperator-Progenitor befohlen, laden wir, die Nährende Kirche, alle ein, die Hilfe benötigen oder in Not sind, bei uns Unterschlupf zu suchen. Es spielt keine Rolle, ob Ihr gottesfürchtig oder Apostaten seid. Wir hier in Jesevon helfen jedem."
languages.original_text: The vox operator has intercepted a transmission coming from the planet. The message runs, "With faith in our Emperor-Progenitor, we are broadcasting this to any who may hear. This is Jesevon, an abode of true-believing pilgrims, colonial designation AIII-649-Minoris. As commanded by our Emperor-Progenitor, we, the Church Nourishing, invite any who need help or are in distress to take shelter with us. It matters not whether you are pious people or apostates. Here in Jesevon, we help everyone."

traits.locale_text: Der Vox-Operateur hat eine Übertragung abgefangen, die von dem Planeten kam. Die Nachricht lautet: "Voller Vertrauen zu unserem Imperator-Progenitor senden wir dies an alle, die es hören. Hier spricht Jesevon, eine Heimstatt wahrhaft gläubiger Pilger, Koloniebezeichnung AIII 649-Minoris. Wie von unserem Imperator-Progenitor befohlen, laden wir, die Nährende Kirche, alle ein, die Hilfe benötigen oder in Not sind, bei uns Unterschlupf zu suchen. Es spielt keine Rolle, ob Ihr gottesfürchtig oder Sünder seid. Wir hier in Jesevon helfen jedem."

languages.text: L'opérateur-vox a intercepté une transmission provenant de la planète : « Avec la bénédiction de notre Empereur-Géniteur, nous diffusons ce message à l'attention de tous ceux qui peuvent l'entendre. Ce monde nommé Jesevon, désignation coloniale AIII 649-Minoris, est un havre où se rassemblent les plus fervents pèlerins. Selon la volonté de notre Empereur-Géniteur, l'Église des Nourrisseurs que nous formons accueille en son sein quiconque a besoin d'aide ou se trouve en détresse. Que vous soyez croyants ou apostats, peu importe. À Jesevon, nous tendons la main à tous. »
languages.original_text: The vox operator has intercepted a transmission coming from the planet. The message runs, "With faith in our Emperor-Progenitor, we are broadcasting this to any who may hear. This is Jesevon, an abode of true-believing pilgrims, colonial designation AIII-649-Minoris. As commanded by our Emperor-Progenitor, we, the Church Nourishing, invite any who need help or are in distress to take shelter with us. It matters not whether you are pious people or apostates. Here in Jesevon, we help everyone."

traits.locale_text: L'opérateur-vox a intercepté une transmission provenant de la planète : « Avec la bénédiction de notre Empereur-Géniteur, nous diffusons ce message à l'attention de tous ceux qui peuvent l'entendre. Ce monde nommé Jesevon, désignation coloniale AIII 649-Minoris, est un havre où se rassemblent les plus fervents pèlerins. Selon la volonté de notre Empereur-Géniteur, l'Église des Nourrisseurs que nous formons accueille en son sein quiconque a besoin d'aide ou se trouve en détresse. Que vous soyez croyants ou pécheurs, peu importe. À Jesevon, nous tendons la main à tous. »

languages.text: Voks operatörü, gezegenden gelen bir ileti yakaladı. Mesaj şu şekilde: "Ata İmparator'umuza olan inancımızla, bu mesajımız herkesin duyması için yayınlıyoruz. Burası; atanmış koloni ismi AIII-649-Minoris olan, inancı güçlü seyyahların yurdu Jesevon. Ata İmparator'un emriyle biz Besleyenler Kilisesi; yardıma ihtiyacı olanları, zor durumda bulunanları bizimle birlikte barınmaya davet ediyoruz. İster dindar ister dinden dönmüş olun, bizim için fark etmez. Jesevon'da herkese yardım ediyoruz."
languages.original_text: The vox operator has intercepted a transmission coming from the planet. The message runs, "With faith in our Emperor-Progenitor, we are broadcasting this to any who may hear. This is Jesevon, an abode of true-believing pilgrims, colonial designation AIII-649-Minoris. As commanded by our Emperor-Progenitor, we, the Church Nourishing, invite any who need help or are in distress to take shelter with us. It matters not whether you are pious people or apostates. Here in Jesevon, we help everyone."
